import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function EmployeeEditjob({ }) { const { id } =useParams() // Get the job ID from the URL console.log(id) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ jobtitle: '', jobcategory: '', jobtype: '', offeredsalary: '', experience: '', qualification: '', gender: '', country: '', city: '', location: '', latitude: '', longitude: '', email: '', website: '', estsince: '', completeaddress: '', description: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', Vacnices: '', question: [], }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(''); // Fetch job details when the component mounts useEffect(() => { const fetchJobDetails = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(` http://localhost:8080/jobs/${id}`); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch job details'); } const data = await response.json(); setFormData(data); // Populate form with fetched data } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching job details:', error); setError('Failed to fetch job details'); } }; fetchJobDetails(); }, [id]); // Handle form input changes const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Handle question input changes const handleQuestionChange = (e, index) => { const newQuestions = [...formData.question]; newQuestions[index] = e.target.value; setFormData({ ...formData, question: newQuestions }); }; // Add a new question field const addQuestion = () => { setFormData({ ...formData, question: [...formData.question, ''] }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch(` http://localhost:8080/jobs/${id}`, { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to update job'); } const data = await response.json(); setSuccess('Job updated successfully'); setError(''); } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating job:', error); setError('Failed to update job'); setSuccess(''); } }; return ( <>
